Package edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback

Contains classes used for displaying, manipulating, storing, and e-mailing comments to members of CS180A/280A: Mobile Application Development.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClassListFragment.OnPersonSelectedListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a Person is selected in the list view.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassListFragment
    An ListFragment that displays a list of the names of people in CS 180A.
    Comment
    A comment meant for a classmate.
    CommentContentProvider
    A content provider for comments meant for specified individuals, backed by a SQLiteDatabase.
    CommentFragment
    A fragment that solicits a Comment for a specific Person.
    MainActivity
    An Activity that displays a list of the names of people in CS 180A.
    MySQLiteOpenHelper
    Creates and upgrades a database for storing Comments.
    Person
    Information about a person (student or teacher) in CS 180A: Mobile Application Development.

Package edu.mills.cs180a.classfeedback Description

Contains classes used for displaying, manipulating, storing, and e-mailing comments to members of CS180A/280A: Mobile Application Development.
Author:
AJ Parmidge
